data.text: @pmadedc Hi pmadedc. Tumbler is allowed as long as empty. Hair straighteners may be packed in your hand carry. Please make sure to remove the battery (if any) before packing. Note that passengers can only bring up to one (1) curler or straightener that contain hydrocarbon gas. Stay safe.

data.text: @21xtina Hi 𓆩♡𓆪 xtina! You are allowed one (1) carry-on baggage inside the cabin, w/ a maximum weight of seven (7) kilograms and dimension of up to 56cm x 36cm x 23cm. This includes most wheeled cabin bags and backpacks. Must fit inside the overhead bin and must be stowed by yourself.

data.text: @cloudwhen I'm sorry to hear this jeo. Open Chrome. At the top right, click More. Click More tools. Clear browsing data. At the top, choose a time range. Next to "Cookies and other site data" and "Cached images and files," check the boxes. Click Clear data. Hope this helps.

data.text:
#CEBAdvisory - additional cancellations as of 3am

5J991/992 Manila – General Santos – Manila* 
5J891/892 Manila – Boracay (Caticlan) – Manila * 
5J657/658 Manila – Tacloban – Manila*  

Affected passengers on the above flights have been rebooked to the next available flights.

@rhicenshine Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, LAU. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@MmeBlackBalloon Hi Number 99! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@itsmemng You may also check our travel advisory thru https://t.co/KuymGz608i for further details. Thank you!

@itsmemng Hi there Michelle! As of the moment, flights for 26SEP are still confirmed. In case of changes and/or cancellation, a notification will be sent via email. For quick checking on real time status of your flight, please refer to this link: https://t.co/n8RpsOcAwS.

For other questions or concerns,  passengers may send a message via Charlie the Chatbot on the Cebu Pacific website. 
 
We will provide updates as necessary.

They may also opt to select their preferred option (rebook, travel fund, refund) online through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website (https://t.co/GAB2WonRbR) until 30 days from date of departure.

•5J565/566 Manila – Cebu – Manila  

Affected passengers on the above flights have been rebooked to the next available flights.

•5J381/382 Manila – Cagayan de Oro – Manila  
•5J635/636 Manila – Puerto Princesa – Manila  
•5J483/484 Manila – Bacolod – Manila  
•5J919/920 Manila – Boracay (Caticlan) – Manila   
•5J451/452 Manila – Iloilo – Manila  
•5J785/786 Manila – Butuan – Manila

As we recover from the operational impact brought about by Typhoon Karding (Noru), Cebu Pacific has cancelled the following flights for September 26, 2022: 
 
•5J325/326 Manila – Legazpi – Manila 
•5J861/862 Manila – Zamboanga – Manila  
•5J961/962 Manila – Davao – Manila

Cebu Pacific Advisory #3 
Flexible Options due to Typhoon Karding (Noru) 
As of September 26, 2022, 12:15am https://t.co/FUKIT0Uwdf

data.text: CEB will also be extending its flexible options for passengers with flights touching Manila until 12 noon tomorrow, September 26, 2022.

Affected passengers have been informed and provided options (rebook, travel fund, refund) earlier.  
 
5J196/197 Manila – Cauayan – Manila 
5J504/505 Manila – Tuguegarao – Manila  
DG6111/6112 Manila – Naga – Manila  
DG6117/6118 Manila – Naga – Manila 
DG6504 Cebu – Manila

Cebu Pacific Advisory #2 
Flexible Options due to Super Typhoon Karding (Noru) 
As of September 25, 2022, 7:30pm 

In light of the impending typhoon, Karding (Noru), Cebu Pacific and Cebgo has already cancelled the following flights today, September 25, 2022.

1. Rebook 

Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. Fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from original flight date.

5J196/197 Manila – Cauayan – Manila 
5J504/505 Manila – Tuguegarao – Manila  
DG6111/6112 Manila – Naga – Manila  
DG6117/6118 Manila – Naga – Manila 
DG6504 Cebu – Manila

@jeperiii Hi Popoy! You may visit this page to know our latest travel advisory https://t.co/SFb3Lz5IdB. Stay safe!
@magellofenis Hi Magello. You may visit this link to know flights that will still operate as scheduled today https://t.co/SFb3Lz5IdB.

@owa3valles Hi Owa. Due to Super Typhoon Karding (Noru), passengers with flights touching Manila from 4pm onwards today, September 25, 2022, and who wish to voluntarily postpone their scheduled flights may avail of CEB’s flexible options. Visit here: https://t.co/SFb3Lz5IdB for more info.

@aqcUOQ1SbZWGLvj Hi フィリピン! Spare/loose batteries like power bank, must be carried in hand-carry baggage only and must NOT exceed 100Wh (equivalent to about 20,000mAh to 27,000mAh depending on the output voltage). And it must be individually protected to avoid short-circuit.

For other questions or concerns, passengers may send a message via Charlie the Chatbot on the Cebu Pacific website.

We will provide updates as necessary.
To view the complete list of flights that are scheduled to operate today, please click here: https://t.co/SFb3Lz6g39.

Due to Super Typhoon Karding (Noru), passengers with flights touching Manila from 4pm onwards today, September 25, 2022, and who wish to voluntarily postpone their scheduled flights may avail of CEB’s flexible options- Rebook or Convert to Travel Fund. https://t.co/woHa64zDbA
